### Speed(p.190)
  * Characters have a base movement of 30’ (6 squares)
  * Characters wearing medium armor reduce their base speed to 20’ (4 squares)
  * Characters wearing heavy armor reduce their base speed to 15’ (3 squares)

### Exceptions

  * Harriers in light or no armor gain a bonus to their base movement according to level starting with an additional 10’ (2 squares) at level 1 and going up to 40’ (8 squares) at level 20.(p.51)
